Package com.intellij.application.options.schemes

Interface SchemesModel<T extends Scheme>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Actual scheme type derived from Scheme
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeStyleSchemesModel, ColorAndFontOptions, InspectionProfileSchemesModel, KeymapSchemeManager

    public interface SchemesModel<T extends Scheme>
    A generic schemes model used in schemes UI: schemes combo box and related actions.
    See Also:
    AbstractSchemesPanel, AbstractSchemeActions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDeleteScheme(T scheme) 
      boolean canDuplicateScheme(T scheme) 
      boolean canRenameScheme(T scheme) 
      boolean canResetScheme(T scheme) 
      boolean containsScheme(java.lang.String name, boolean projectScheme) 
      boolean differsFromDefault(T scheme) 
      boolean isProjectScheme(T scheme) 
      void removeScheme(T scheme) 

    • Method Detail

      • canDuplicateScheme

        boolean canDuplicateScheme(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if the scheme can be duplicated with a different name.

      • canResetScheme

        boolean canResetScheme(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if the scheme can be reset from default values (presets) in principle regardless of whether scheme settings actually differ from presets or not.
        See Also:
        differsFromDefault(Scheme)

      • canDeleteScheme

        boolean canDeleteScheme(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if the scheme can be deleted, normally applies to custom schemes created by a user.

      • isProjectScheme

        boolean isProjectScheme(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given scheme is a project one. Always false if project schemes are not supported.

      • canRenameScheme

        boolean canRenameScheme(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if scheme's name can be edited.

      • containsScheme

        boolean containsScheme(java.lang.String name,
                       boolean projectScheme)
        Parameters:
        name - The scheme to check.
        projectScheme - Level of the scheme to check. If schemes model does not support project level schemes then the parameter is always equal to false.
        Returns:
        True if a scheme by the given name already exists.

      • differsFromDefault

        boolean differsFromDefault(T scheme)
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if scheme's settings differ from default values (presets). The method is called only if canResetScheme(Scheme) returns true.

      • removeScheme

        void removeScheme(T scheme)
